name: Apocalypse Rider
description: In the scorched wasteland speed is all that matters! Apocalypse Rider is a VR arcade motorcycle game where you must prevail the high-speed wasteland roads, avoid the hostile traffic and keep surviving, speeding and RIDING!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: This game requires an VR headset, One USB 2.0 or faster port, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2, or better
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
